modelIdentification.name: NATO Education and Training Network (NETN) Multi-Resolution Modelling (MRM) Module
modelIdentification.purpose: The purpose of NETN-MRM is to support federations where models are represented at multiple levels of resolution and where the level of resolution can change dynamically during a simulation.
modelIdentification.description: The MRM FOM module specifies interaction classes necessary to enable federation multi-resolution modeling.
modelIdentification.useLimitation: NETN-MRM covers the following cases: * Aggregation of subunits and/or physical entities * Disaggregation of unit into subunits and/or physical entities * Division of simulated unit into specific parts - resources divided and all entities simulated * Merge of previously divided parts with simulated unit. * Activate and Inactivate aggregate units' representation in the simulation
modelIdentification.useHistory: v1.1.1 - Initial version of NETN-MRM FOM Module released as part of NETN-FOM v2.0.
v2.0.0 - Updated version by MSG-163 to be part of NETN-FOM v3.0.

poc.pocName: MSG-163 Evolution of NATO Standards for Federated Simulation
MSG-134 NATO Distributed Simulation Architecture & Design, Compliance Testing and Certification
MSG-106 Enhanced CAX Architecture, Desing and Methodology

attribute.name: UniqueId
attribute.semantics: Required. A unique identifier for the object. The Universally Unique Identifier (UUID) is either generated or defined as part of scenario initialization, e.g. using NETN-ORG MSDL data. The unique identifier can serve dual purposes. It is a unique identification of the NETN_Aggregate object instance but can also be a reference to a NETN-ORG unit element with the same unique identifier.

attribute.name: Status
attribute.semantics: Required. Indicate if this aggregate unit currently is being simulated or not. E.g. units mounted or embarked on transports can be set to inactive. During an inactive state, the attribute values may not reflect an accurate, current value. Therefore, any subscribing federate can ignore inactive units. An inactive instance may have its instance attributes updated by a federate but reflected updates shall be ignored by receiving federates. All attributes must be updated to represent the current status of the instance before setting the status to active.

attribute.name: SubunitList
attribute.semantics: Optional. Reference to disaggregated representations of subsets of the aggregate unit when registered in the federation. Each element should refer to an existing NETN_Aggregate object in the federation. If not published, disaggregation is not supported.

attribute.name: ParentUnit
attribute.semantics: Optional. Reference to parent aggregate entity. If not published, aggregation is not supported. The default value is 0000000000000000 (no parent unit).

attribute.name: DividedUnitList
attribute.semantics: Optional. Reference to other aggregate or physical entities divided from the aggregate unit to represent specific subsets of holdings. If not published, a division is not supported.

attribute.name: SourceUnit
attribute.semantics: Optional. Reference to an active NETN_Aggregate instance, the source of a NETN-MRM division. If not published, merging is not supported. The default value is 0000000000000000 representing no source unit.

attribute.name: EmbeddedUnitList
attribute.semantics: Optional. Reference to units or platforms embarked on and transported by this unit. If not published, transport of embedded units not supported.

attribute.name: HigherHeadquarters
attribute.semantics: Optional. A reference to an entity representing the aggregate unit's superior or headquarters from which orders are given and to which reports are sent. The highest level unit or headquarters will publish 0000000000000000 as its HigherHeadquarters value. The referenced entity may or may not be registered in the federation as a NETN_Aggregate and/or NETN-ORG unit. If not published, the aggregate does not have a superior unit or headquarter. The default value is 0000000000000000 (no higher headquarters).

attribute.name: Mounted
attribute.semantics: Optional. The percentage of aggregate personnel travelling on or in their organic transport. Default 100% - all personnel mounted.

attribute.name: SymbolId
attribute.semantics: Optional. A symbol identifier represented as a string.

attribute.name: Callsign
attribute.semantics: Required. A callsign used to address the unit. Callsigns should be unique in the context in which they are used but not required to be globally unique.

attribute.name: Echelon
attribute.semantics: Optional. The size of the unit (level of command).

attribute.name: EntityList
attribute.semantics: Optional. This attribute provides data on all entities comprising the aggregate. Entities include equipment, e.g. platforms, weapons, sensors and lifeforms such as personnel. Each entity contains key status attributes and subunit allocation information. If not provided the status and allocation of entities is not modelled on an entity level.

attribute.name: SuppliesStatus
attribute.semantics: Optional. The type and quantities of supplies available (on hand) to the unit. If not provided, the amount of available supplies is undefined.

attribute.name: EquipmentStatus
attribute.semantics: Optional. This summarizes the health status of the equipment comprising the aggregate. If not provided, the status of equipment is undefined.

attribute.name: PersonnelStatus
attribute.semantics: Optional. This summarizes the health status of personnel comprising the aggregate. If not provided, the status of personnel is undefined.

attribute.name: VisualSignature
attribute.semantics: Describes the unit's susceptibility to electro-optical detection.

attribute.name: HUMINTSignature
attribute.semantics: Describes the unit's susceptibility to human intelligence (HUMINT), i.e. information collected and provided by human sources.

attribute.name: ElectronicSignature
attribute.semantics: Describes the aggregate's susceptibility to electronic detection both as a summary value and by identifying aggregate sensors together with their operational status.

attribute.name: CombatValue
attribute.semantics: Optional. A summary value (in per cent) of unit effectiveness based on the level of training, leadership, morale, personnel and equipment operational status, etc. The default value is 100%.

attribute.name: CoverStatus
attribute.semantics: Optional. Describes the unit's protection from the effects of weapons fire. Default is 0% - Fully affected by weapon fire.

attribute.name: CaptureStatus
attribute.semantics: The status of an aggregate with respect to its control or influence over its own activities.

attribute.name: Mission
attribute.semantics: The operational task the aggregate has been ordered to perform.

attribute.name: Activity
attribute.semantics: Optional. The current activity of the platform. The value is based on the Joint Consultation, Command and Control Information Exchange Data Model (JC3IEDM) action-event-category-code. The JC3IEDM is a fully documented standard [NATO STANAG 5525] for an information exchange data model for the sharing of C2 information. Default is 0 (Other activity).

attribute.name: Route
attribute.semantics: Optional. The current path of movement.

attribute.name: Destination
attribute.semantics: Optional. The current destination of movement.

attribute.name: WeaponsControlOrder
attribute.semantics: Optional. Describes current Weapon Control Order Free, Tight, or Hold. Default is 0 - Other.

interactionClass.name: MRM_Interaction
interactionClass.semantics: Base class for all MRM interactions.

parameter.name: EventId
parameter.semantics: Unique identifier for all MRM interactions belonging to the same request/respons event.

interactionClass.name: Request
interactionClass.semantics: A base class for all MRM Request events.

parameter.name: Federate
parameter.semantics: Required. Intended federate responsible for performing the requested action. Sending federate should ensure that receiving federate can perform requested action. If not able to perform, a response interaction indicating failure should be returned.

parameter.name: AggregateUnit
parameter.semantics: Required for all requests except QuerySupportedCapabilities. Unique identifier for the NETN_Aggregate for which this request is related to.

interactionClass.name: Aggregate
interactionClass.semantics: Instruction to the AggregateFederate to perform aggregation of the specified AggregateUnit's parts.

parameter.name: RemoveSubunits
parameter.semantics: Optional. Indicates if the disaggregate subunits (represented as aggregates in the federation) should be deleted from the federation execution. Default is TRUE - all subunits should be deleted. If FALSE all disaggregate subunits shall be set to inactive.

interactionClass.name: Disaggregate
interactionClass.semantics: Instruction to perform a full disaggregation of a AggregatedUnit. All subunits and platforms will be registered in the federation.

interactionClass.name: Divide
interactionClass.semantics: Instruction to divide the simulated AggregateUnit into multiple simulated object. The resouces are divided among the simulated entities. After successful division two simulated entities represent the entire Unit. 1) The original AggregateUnit and 2) the divided unit or platform. Both these entities are simulated until merged.

parameter.name: Equipment
parameter.semantics: Optional. Amount of equipment of different type and health status to be divided.

parameter.name: Personnel
parameter.semantics: Optional. Amount of personnel of different type and health status to be divided.

parameter.name: Supplies
parameter.semantics: Optional. Amount of supplies to divide.

parameter.name: RegisterPhysicalEntities
parameter.semantics: Optional. If true all Equipment of type Platform and Lifeform are published as individual objects in the federation.

interactionClass.name: Merge
interactionClass.semantics: Instruction to merg the simulated AggregateUnit with the selected divided parts. After successful merge the divided parts are removed from the federation and their resources are combined with the AggregatedUnit.

parameter.name: Subunits
parameter.semantics: Required. A set of unique identifiers of subelements of the AggregateUnit. These can be any subunit and/or equipment defined at a subunit on any level.

interactionClass.name: QuerySupportedCapabilities
interactionClass.semantics: A request to query the capabilities of a specified federation to provide support for MRM events. The queried federate shall respond with a CapabilitiesSupported interaction.

interactionClass.name: Activate
interactionClass.semantics: Request federate to change of status of AggregateUnit to Active. If required the unit will be registered in the federation.

interactionClass.name: Deactivate
interactionClass.semantics: Request change of status of AggregateUnit to Inactive and if indicated remove it from the federation.

parameter.name: RemoveUnit
parameter.semantics: Optional. Indicates if the Aggregate Unit shall be removed as an object instance in the federation. Default = FALSE - keep object instance in federation.

interactionClass.name: Response
interactionClass.semantics: A response from the receiving federate indicating ability to comply with request.

parameter.name: Status
parameter.semantics: Required. Specifies the result of the request action. TRUE indicates success.

interactionClass.name: CapabilitiesSupported
interactionClass.semantics: An interaction sent in respons to a QuerySupportedCapabilities request. The respons include a list of names of the supported capabilities for the Aggregate unit specified in the query. The names are one or more of "Aggregate", "Disaggregate", "Divide", "Merge", "Activate" and "Inactivate".

parameter.name: CapabilityNames
parameter.semantics: Required. A list of names of the supported capabilities for the Aggregate entity specified in the query. The names are one or more of "Aggregate", "Disaggregate", "Divide", "Merge", "Activate" and "Inactivate".

enumeratedData.name: CaptureStatusEnum8
enumeratedData.semantics: The status of a person or unit with respect to their control or influence over their own activities. Default: 1 - Not Captured.

enumeratedData.name: ConcealmentEnum32
enumeratedData.semantics: The reason for the objects concealment

enumeratedData.name: SensorStateEnum32
enumeratedData.semantics: The emission states of aggregate sensors

arrayData.name: ArrayOfResourceStatus
arrayData.semantics: The array of health states for a named resource.

arrayData.name: ArrayOfEntityStruct
arrayData.semantics: Data for one or more entities that comprise an entity list.

arrayData.name: ArrayOfSensorStruct
arrayData.semantics: Array with definitio0ns of sensors, 1+ cardinality

field.name: DVOSignaturePercent
field.semantics: A summary percentage of an aggregates susceptibility to detection by direct view optics, i.e. the human eye, binoculars, or telescopes. A unit with zero percent signature would be concealed from DVO detection.

field.name: I2SignaturePercent
field.semantics: A summary percentage of an aggregates susceptibility to detection by Image Intensifying sensors. A unit with zero percent signature would be invisible to image intensifiers (I2).

field.name: ThermalSignaturePercent
field.semantics: A summary percentage of an aggregates susceptibility to detection by thermal sensors. A unit with zero percent signature would be invisible to thermal sensors.

fixedRecordData.name: MissionStruct
fixedRecordData.semantics: The operational task the aggregate has been ordered to perform, the time the mission was assigned, and the estimated completion time.

field.name: StartTime
field.semantics: An optional field providing the mission start time

field.name: EndTime
field.semantics: An optional field providing the mission estimated end time

field.name: MissionEnum
field.semantics: The mission assigned to the aggregate

fixedRecordData.name: HUMINTSignatureStruct
fixedRecordData.semantics: Describes the unit's susceptibility to human intelligence (HUMINT), i.e. information collected and provided by human sources.

field.name: HUMINTSignaturePercent
field.semantics: A summary percentage of an aggregates susceptibility to detection by human intelligence collectors. Zero percent signature means an aggregate is impervious to HUMINT.

fixedRecordData.name: ElectronicSignatureStruct
fixedRecordData.semantics: A summary percentage of an aggregates susceptibility to detection of its electronic emissions. Zero percent means that the aggregate has no electronic emissions.

field.name: ElectronicSignaturePercent
field.semantics: A summary percentage of an aggregates susceptibility to detection of its electronic emissions. Zero percent means that the aggregate has no electronic emissions.

field.name: SensorArray
field.semantics: A list of sensors owned by the aggregate together with their respective operational status and range

fixedRecordData.name: ResourceStatusNumberStruct
fixedRecordData.semantics: The name of a resource and the number of instances of that resource by health status.

field.name: NumberHealthyOrIntact
field.semantics: The number of healthy or intact resources

field.name: NumberSlightlyDamaged
field.semantics: The number of slightly damaged resources

field.name: NumberModeratelyDamaged
field.semantics: The number of moderately damaged resources

field.name: NumberSignificantlyDamaged
field.semantics: The number of significantly damaged resources

field.name: NumberDestroyed
field.semantics: The number of destroyed or consumed resources

field.name: ResourceName
field.semantics: The name of the resource

field.name: ResourceType
field.semantics: The type of the resource (as described in the Bit Encoded Values for Use with Protocols for Distributed Interactive Simulation Applications)

fixedRecordData.name: EntityStruct
fixedRecordData.semantics: An entity represented to the federation as part of the aggregate object which owns it.

field.name: Callsign
field.semantics: The unique identifier of the object.

field.name: EntityCategory
field.semantics: Indicates whether the entity is equipment, person, emitter, etc.

field.name: EntityStatus
field.semantics: The damage state of the entity.

field.name: IsDistinctObject
field.semantics: A BaseEntity object has been created to represent this entity (true) or not (false). Default is false.

field.name: IsUnavailable
field.semantics: This entity is in use by another object (true) or not (false). Default is false.

field.name: Facing
field.semantics: Direction is measured in degrees clockwise from orientation of unit. Default is 0.

field.name: Concealment
field.semantics: Indicates whether the entity is concealed and, if so, how

field.name: OffsetLocation
field.semantics: The entity location given as an offset from the location of the aggregate unit in meters.

field.name: UnitAllocation
field.semantics: Reference to unit by UUID to which this entity is allocated as a resource. Unit may or may not be represented in the federation as a NETN_Aggregate and/or NETN-ORG Unit object.

fixedRecordData.name: SensorStruct
fixedRecordData.semantics: Defines a sensor,operational status, damage status, coverage and ID

field.name: SensorStateEnum
field.semantics: The operational status of the sensor

field.name: SensorDamageState
field.semantics: The damage status of the sensor

field.name: SensorCoverage
field.semantics: The maximum range of the sensor

field.name: SensorID
field.semantics: A sensor owned by the aggregate
